subtitle: Use fillet or tenderloin for this recipe, as these cuts are very lean and tender.

method.text: Place the oil, garlic, button mushrooms and peppers in a deep browning dish. Microwave uncovered on High / Full for about 2-3 min stirring halfway through cooking.
Add the pork slices to the pan pressing down into the hot oil then turning over to brown both sides.
In a small jug mix together the tomato puree and orange juice. Mix the cornflour with the red wine until a smooth paste is formed then stir into the jug with the parsley and seasoning.
Pour the sauce into the browning dish, cover loosely then microwave on High / Full for about 5 min stirring the sauce halfway through cooking. Serve immediately on warmed serving plates.

title: Fillet of pork Provencale - microwave
